channel.title: [317] Webclient doesn't connect to my server
channel.description:
Hello, I made a webclient and it works fine. But: it only connects at the computer where my server runs on. I put the static ip in my egui.java and made a webclient. The same did I with my no-ip. So I have 2 webclient now. I can connect on both with the computer with server but on no other. Portforwarding is OK. Canyouseeme.org says it sees my service and I can register my server on mopar's status page.
I don't know what's wrong :confused:

item.title: [317] Webclient doesn't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

I’ve found the problem
Look in client.java for “server”
You should see something like this:
setserver("", “43594”);
Now replace the first quotes to your ip

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Webclient doesn't connect to my server
